td.content: s:41 yr old white m lawyer presents with 10 days history of worsening Kidney. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he smokes one pack daily for 4 years o:Height 65 in, Weight 190 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.

td.content: s:pt presents with Kidney for 7 weeks. he has a history of Pyelonephritis for past 4 years. he is a m aged 42 yrs. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he smokes 1 pack daily for 5 years o:Height 64 in, Weight 185 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.
